com.absio.util

Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.util.JsonHelper

  • public class JsonHelper
extends Object
    This is a helper class for converting objects to and from JSON

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonHelper()
      Default constructor creates the helper with "prettyPrinting" (carriage returns and indentation) and nulls not serialized (when serialized you see the null values in the JSON).
      JsonHelper(boolean prettyPrinting, boolean serializeNulls)
      Create the helper with the given prettyPrinting and serializeNull settings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T fromJson(com.google.gson.JsonElement json, Class<T> classOfT)
      Converts the given json element into an object of the given class.
      <T> T fromJson(String json, Class<T> classOfT)
      Converts the given json into an object of the given class.
      <T> T fromJson(String json, Type typeOfT)
      Converts the given json into an object of the given type.
      protected com.google.gson.Gson getGson() 
      protected void registerTypeAdapters(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder builder) 
      String toJson(Object object)
      Converts the given object into a JSON string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonHelper

        public JsonHelper()
        Default constructor creates the helper with "prettyPrinting" (carriage returns and indentation) and nulls not serialized (when serialized you see the null values in the JSON).

      • JsonHelper

        public JsonHelper(boolean prettyPrinting,
                  boolean serializeNulls)
        Create the helper with the given prettyPrinting and serializeNull settings.
        Parameters:
        prettyPrinting - true when you want carriages returns and indentation in the JSON output
        serializeNulls - true when you want to see null values in the JSON output

    • Method Detail

      • fromJson

                      Class<T> classOfT)
        Converts the given json element into an object of the given class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of object to be created
        Parameters:
        json - the json element to convert
        classOfT - the class type to convert the element into
        Returns:
        the converted object

      • fromJson

        public <T> T fromJson(String json,
                      Type typeOfT)
        Converts the given json into an object of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object to create
        Parameters:
        json - the json to parse
        typeOfT - the type of object to create
        Returns:
        the converted object
